TopicTitle: Reporting in from Moffet Field, CA

Articles.Content: o/ hello all. Just got hook on the game 3 days ago. Its awesome. The forums are very helpful (so are the YouTube links!). And there are some really cool space designs out there! Never thought I'd learn so much from a game that is amazingly fun and awesome to play. Here's to some more successful and failed missions in Kerbal space!

Welcome mackadelik! Good to have you aboard.

Having fun while learning through spectacular failure is our bread and butter around here. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Happy landings!
